data.title: French Institute Alliance Française (FIAF)
data.meta_description: Dir. Jean-Pierre Bekolo, 2005, Cameroon, France, 94min, DCP, Color With Adèle Ado, Dorylia Calmel, Emile Abossolo M'bo In French with English subtitles Considered director Jean-Pierre Bekolo’s magnum opus, this superbly photographed, stylishly edited, and beautifully scored film centers on two young femme fatales who set out to rid a futuristic Cameroon of its corrupt, powerful
data.meta_site_name: French Institute Alliance Française (FIAF) - New York's premier center for French language and culture!
data.text:
Attend for Free!

Join FIAF as a Member to get free admission to weekly CinéSalon screenings for a full year.

Save 65% with the Series Pass!

$25

Includes all 5 films presented as part of our African Futurism: The World of JPB series, from Feb 6–27

Individual Film
